tweet: Richard Florida(Business Week):People under the age of 30 change jobs almost once a year compare to national average of once every 3 years.
Be sure to list your most important task, accomplishment or responsibility first on your resume.
Have a portfolio? Consider putting it online and including the link on your resume. Let your employers see it!
After an interview, other than sending your follow up email, wait a week before making any other contact with employers
When emailing resumes, it may be a good idea to convert them to PDFs to avoid formatting issues.
